snippet: The 8.4 million viewers who watched the Americans defeat Germany, 2-0, in Tuesday’s first semifinal brought the tournament average for all games to 1.3 million, up 45 percent from four years ago.
abstract: Women's World Cup semifinal match between United States and Germany draws 8.4 million viewers, bringing tournament average for all games to 1.3 million, up 45 percent from 2011.
lead_paragraph: The 8.4 million viewers who watched the Americans defeat Germany, 2-0, in Tuesday’s first semifinal brought the tournament average for all games to 1.3 million, up 45 percent from four years ago.

headline.main: U.S. Women’s Team Lifts Viewership of the World Cup
headline.print_headline: U.S. Women’s Team Lifts Viewership of World Cup

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
